intro: Ruehssia oaxacana, commonly known as the Oaxaca ruehssia, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a rough, textured surface. It thrives in shady, moist environments and is often found in cloud forests.
